snippet: Images by the photographer Arlene Gottfried are featured in “East Village Our Village,” an exhibit that reopens at the Lower Eastside Girls Club on Sept. 11.
abstract: Photographer Arlene Gottfried captured images of East Harlem, Lower East Side and Williamsburg, Brooklyn, in 1970s, '80s and '90s, when such areas were cultural enclaves with distinct character; Gottfried's images will be on display in September in exhibition East Village Our Village at the Lower East Side Girls Club.
lead_paragraph: Images by the photographer Arlene Gottfried are featured in “East Village Our Village,” an exhibit that reopens at the Lower Eastside Girls Club on Sept. 11.
